label: Sitemap & Information Architecture
description: Give me a 10,000-foot view of my website and map out the content sections for each page of my website or funnel to create a clear and intuitive user flow.

label: Website Wireframe
description: Create a conversion-optimized wireframe for my landing page or website.

label: Homepage Design Concept
description: Create a pixel-perfect design concept for my new homepage that impresses my customers.

label: Landing Page Design Concept
description: Design a high-converting landing page concept for my product or service.

label: Internal Web Page Design Concept
description: Design my internal web pages based on your pre-defined design guidelines or homepage concept.

label: Mobile App Design Concept
description: Create a user-centric design concept for my mobile app based on a wireframe.

label: Web App Design Concept
description: Design a new user interface for my web app based on my current version or new wireframes.

label: Logo Design
description: Design a new logo for my brand or product.

label: Brand Guidelines
description: Create new brand guidelines for my product or company.

label: Flyer & Brochure Design
description: Create a creative flyer or brochure design for my product, service, or event.

label: Book Cover Design
description: Design a cover for my paperback book or ebook that gets attention.

label: Social Media Posts
description: Design eye-catching social media posts for every platform and format.

label: Social Media Ads
description: Create a scroll-stopping ad image for multiple social media platforms.

label: Banner Ads
description: Design attention-grabbing banner ads to promote my products or services.

label: Landing Page Graphic
description: Create professional-looking graphics for my landing page or website that is customized for my brand.

label: Motion Graphic
description: Create an animated graphic for my landing page or website to increase engagement.

label: Packaging Design
description: Design a professional package design for my physical product.

label: Email Newsletter Template
description: Design a beautiful email template for newsletters or transactional emails.

label: Homepage Development
description: Set up my new site and develop the homepage based on a predefined design concept or template.

label: Internal Web Development
description: Develop an additional page on my website based on a predefined design concept or template.

label: Landing Page Development
description: Build a landing page based on a design concept or template that is optimized for performance.

label: Email Template Development
description: Develop an email template based on a design concept that can be used in my email marketing software.

label: Fixing Website Bugs
description: Improve the user experience of my website by fixing errors or bugs on my website.

label: Plugin Updates
description: Update all my Wordpress Plugins in a safe way so that my site doesn't break.

label: Security Features Setup
description: Protect my website from getting hacked by implementing necessary security features.

label: Implementing Website with 3rd Party Tool
description: Integrate an external tool with my website and make it look on- brand.

label: Website Content Update
description: Update the content on my website to improve the user experience and/or search rankings.

label: Adding New Blog Post
description: Add a new blog post to my company blog with suitable graphics and a catchy featured image.

label: Site Speed Optimization
description: Improve the loading time of my website to improve conversions and search rankings.

label: Site Backup
description: Secure my website with a backup of the current site or install a plugin that does it automatically in the future.

label: Broken Links and 404 Errors Check
description: Check my website for any broken links and errors that we need to fix to improve the user experience and search rankings.

label: Google Analytics Setup
description: Install the Google Analytics pixel on my website so we can track our site visitors and conversions.

label: Google Search Console Setup
description: Install the Google Search Console pixel on my website, so I can index my pages and increase search rankings.

label: Google Tag Manager Setup
description: Install the GTM pixel on my website to speed up the integration of third-party tools in the future.

label: Funnel Analytics Setup
description: Set up my funnel and website analytics tool to track user behavior and conversions.

label: Facebook Pixel Setup
description: Install the Facebook pixel on my website and landing pages to track ad performance and conversions.

label: Payment Integration
description: Integrate my checkout page with my preferred payment provider.

label: Cookie Consent Setup
description: Set up the cookie consent tool to stay compliant with my website worldwide.

label: Title tag & Meta Description Update
description: Add or update my website''s title tag and meta description of one or multiple pages.

label: Image Alt tag Update
description: Add or update image alt tags on my website so that search engines rank my site higher.

label: Fixing Hosting Issues
description: Fix my hosting issues and ensure that my website is online and secure.

label: Site Migration
description: Migrate my new website to my server or hosting account.

label: DNS Setup
description: Set up my DNS and update my MX server settings when moving my site to another hosting provider.

label: Workflow Setup Between Apps
description: Set up a workflow between my apps to boost our productivity by eliminating recurring tasks.

label: Email Marketing Campaign Setup
description: Set up a new broadcast campaign or drip sequence within my email marketing software.

label: Email Outreach Sequence Setup
description: Set up a new email outreach sequence within my sales automation software.

label: Chatbot Setup
description: Create chatbot automation to engage my website visitors and turn them into customers.

label: Data Enrichment Workflow Setup
description: Create a workflow to build lead lists with information from multiple sources.

label: Automated Image Creation Setup
description: Create a workflow to build lead lists with information from multiple sources.

label: Membership Site Setup
description: Set up a membership feature on my website for gated content that is only visible for logged-in users.

label: Online Course Setup
description: Set up my online course and add the provided learning material.

label: Community Tool Setup
description: Set up my online community including the design of the login area, checkout, and content sections.

label: Webinar Setup
description: Set up the landing page and email marketing campaign for my next webinar.

label: Glide App Setup
description: Build a Glide up based on our Google Sheets data set for my team or clients.

label: Opt-In Popup Design & Setup
description: Design and set up a popup feature on my website and connect it with my email marketing software.

label: Gamification Popup Setup
description: Add a gamification popup to my website to increase engagement and generate leads.

label: Website/Funnel Quiz Setup
description: Set up a quiz funnel for my website or advertising campaigns to create more qualified buyers.

label: Website Personalization Setup
description: Set up a personalization feature on my website to show dynamic content to multiple audiences based on their IP address.

label: Optimize Add to Cart Page
description: Add a coupon code and upsell section to my Add-to Cart page to increase conversions.

label: A/B Test Setup
description: Set up an A/B test for my landing page to test multiple copy and design variations and increase my conversion rate.

label: Social Proof Tool Setup
description: Add a FOMO feature to my website to show site visitors that other people are buying from us.

label: Website Calculator Setup
description: Build and integrate a calculator on my website to help our customers make informed buying decisions.

label: Referral & Reward Program Setup
description: Set up a referral program for my product, service, or newsletter to attract more customers.

label: Automated Image/Video Personalization Setup
description: Personalize my email outreach campaign with dynamic images and videos.

label: Testimonial Campaign Setup
description: Ask my customers for text or video testimonials and highlight them on my website.

label: B2B Website Visitor Identification Setup
description: Set up a website visitor identification tool so I can reach out to companies who browse my website.

label: Landing Page Conversion Audit
description: Conduct an audit of my landing page and give me clear action steps on how to improve my conversion rate.

label: Funnel Audit & Strategy
description: Conduct an audit of my funnel or provide me with tips on how to structure my next funnel.

label: Security Audit
description: Provide me with a report on potential security issues of my website and how to fix them.

label: Software/Tool Suggestions
description: Give me suggestions on software or a tool to do X.

label: Workflow/Automation Suggestions
description: Give me suggestions on automating repetitive tasks with one or multiple apps.
